General.Name: Korea SPAC 3
General.Description: Creative & Innovative System Corporation manufactures and sells equipment for lithium-ion batteries powering IT instruments, EV lithium-ion batteries, fuel and solar cells, displays, etc. It offers electrode manufacturing equipment, such as coater, roll press, slitter, and tape laminators. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Daegu, South Korea.

1.Name: Mr. Han-Jun  Kim
1.Title: Director of Sales, GM of HCIS & Director
